dcterms:description: A multi-agent game of pong where the goal is for both agents to keep the ball in play. The game ends if the ball goes out of bounds from either edge of the screen.
dcterms:title: Cooperative Pong

dcterms:creator: Justin K Terry
Benjamin Black
Mario Jayakumar
Ananth Hari
Luis Santos
Clemens Dieffendahl
Niall L Williams
Yashas Lokesh
Ryan Sullivan
Caroline Horsch
Praveen Ravi
dcterms:description: A physics-based cooperative game where agents must move a ball to the left wall by activating vertically moving pistons. Agents receive rewards based on the ball's movement.
dcterms:title: Pistonball

dcterms:creator: Jayesh K Gupta
Maxim Egorov
Mykel Kochenderfer
dcterms:description: An environment where pursuer agents aim to capture randomly controlled evader agents. Agents receive rewards for touching and surrounding evaders.
dcterms:title: Pursuit

dcterms:creator: Jayesh K Gupta
Maxim Egorov
Mykel Kochenderfer
dcterms:description: A simulation where agents navigate to avoid poison and find food. The environment has a continuous action space modified to discrete for assessment.
dcterms:title: Waterworld

dcterms:creator: Ryan Lowe
Yi Wu
Aviv Tamar
Jean Harb
Pieter Abbeel
Igor Mordatch
dcterms:description: An environment where agents aim to get closer to their target landmark, which is known only by other agents. Agents are rewarded based on their distance to the target.
dcterms:title: Reference

dcterms:creator: Ryan Lowe
Yi Wu
Aviv Tamar
Jean Harb
Pieter Abbeel
Igor Mordatch
dcterms:description: An environment where agents must learn to cover each landmark without colliding with other agents. Agents are rewarded based on their distance to the closest landmark.
dcterms:title: Spread
